sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-container>
      <!-- Top Bar -->
      <v-app-bar app color="blue darken-2" dark>
        <!-- Burger menu icon -->
        <v-btn icon @click="drawer = !drawer">
          <v-icon>mdi-menu</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
        <!-- Title -->
        <v-toolbar-title>{{ userName }}</v-toolbar-title>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <!-- Logout button -->
        <v-btn icon @click="logout">
          <v-icon>mdi-logout</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </v-app-bar>

      <!-- Sidebar -->
      <v-navigation-drawer app v-model="drawer" color="blue darken-2" dark>
        <v-list dense>
          <v-list-item
            v-for="(item, index) in sidebarItems"
            :key="index"
            @click="navigate(index)"
          >
            <v-list-item-action>
              <v-icon>{{ item.icon }}</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-action>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-navigation-drawer>

      <v-main>
        <v-col cols="12">
          <v-card class="mx-auto" max-width="800">
            <v-card-title class="blue darken-2 white--text"
              >Project Information</v-card-title
            >
            <v-card-text>
              <v-row>
                <v-col cols="12">
                  <v-text-field
                    v-model="project.name"
                    label="Project Name"
                    readonly
                  ></v-text-field>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12">
                  <v-text-field
                    v-model="project.company"
                    label="Company"
                    readonly
                  ></v-text-field>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12">
                  <v-img
                    v-if="file1"
                    :src="file1"
                    aspect-ratio="1"
                    contain
                  ></v-img>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12">
                  <v-img
                    v-if="file2"
                    :src="file2"
                    aspect-ratio="1"
                    contain
                  ></v-img>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12">
                  <v-img
                    v-if="file3"
                    :src="file3"
                    aspect-ratio="1"
                    contain
                  ></v-img>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
            </v-card-text>
            <v-card-actions>
              <v-btn color="blue darken-2" @click="submitFiles"
                >Submit Files</v-btn
              >
            </v-card-actions>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-main>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios'

export default {
  data () {
    return {
      drawer: false,
      sidebarItems: [
        { title: 'Proyecto', icon: 'mdi-folder-outline' },
        { title: 'Asesorias', icon: 'mdi-account-plus-outline' }
      ],
      userId: localStorage.getItem('id'),
      project: {
        name: '',
        company: ''
      },
      file1: null,
      file2: null,
      file3: null,
      file1Uploaded: false,
      file2Uploaded: false
    }
  },
  mounted () {
    this.fetchProject()
  },
  methods: {
    navigate (index) {
      switch (index) {
        case 0:
          this.$router.push('/student')
          break
        case 1:
          this.$router.push('/student/asesorias')
          break
        default:
          break
      }
    },
    logout () {
      localStorage.removeItem('token')
      localStorage.removeItem('user')
      this.$router.push('/login')
    },
    fetchProject () {
      if (!this.userId) {
        console.error('No user ID found.')
        return
      }

      axios
        .get(`http://localhost:3000/users/${this.userId}`)
        .then((response) => {
          const user = response.data
          this.file1 = user.file1 ? `${user.file1}` : null
          this.file2 = user.file2 ? `${user.file2}` : null
          this.file3 = user.file3 ? `${user.file3}` : null

          if (!user.project) {
            console.error('No project ID found for the user.')
            return
          }

          return axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/projects/${user.project}`)
        })
        .then((response) => {
          if (response.data) {
            this.project = response.data
          }
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error('Error fetching project data:', error)
        })
    },
    clearFile (fileNumber) {
      switch (fileNumber) {
        case 1:
          this.file1 = null
          this.file1Uploaded = false
          break
        case 2:
          this.file2 = null
          this.file2Uploaded = false
          break
        case 3:
          this.file3 = null
          break
        default:
          break
      }
    },
    submitFiles () {
      const formData = new FormData()
      formData.append('file1', this.file1)

      axios
        .post(`http://localhost:3000/users/${this.userId}/files`, formData, {
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'
          }
        })
        .then((response) => {
          console.log('File 1 uploaded successfully:', response.data)
          this.file1Uploaded = true
          if (this.file2) {
            this.uploadFile2()
          }
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error('Error uploading file 1:', error)
        })
    },
    uploadFile2 () {
      const formData = new FormData()
      formData.append('file2', this.file2)

      axios
        .post(`http://localhost:3000/users/${this.userId}/files`, formData, {
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'
          }
        })
        .then((response) => {
          console.log('File 2 uploaded successfully:', response.data)
          this.file2Uploaded = true
          if (this.file3) {
            this.uploadFile3()
          }
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error('Error uploading file 2:', error)
        })
    },
    uploadFile3 () {
      const formData = new FormData()
      formData.append('file3', this.file3)

      axios
        .post(`http://localhost:3000/users/${this.userId}/files`, formData, {
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'
          }
        })
        .then((response) => {
          console.log('File 3 uploaded successfully:', response.data)
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error('Error uploading file 3:', error)
        })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-btn i {
  color: white;
}
</style>
